introduction_english: Dive into our exploration of "ていねい"—a word you will frequently encounter in formal settings, customer service interactions, and respectful conversations. Let's enhance your cultural understanding and language skills together!
meaning_explanation_english: The word 'ていねい' means being polite, courteous, or careful, often describing a manner of actions or speech. It indicates a respectful and thoughtful approach, often used to show regard for others in communication.

common_words: 丁目: district of a town

kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 丁重 : ていちょう : polite
synonym_explanation: The most common synonym of 'ていねい' is 'ていちょう.' While both words imply politeness and formality, 'ていちょう' often carries a sense of more formal respectfulness used in writing and formal speeches compared to the more general and versatile usage of 'ていねい.'
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of 'ていねい' are 'あらい' and 'ぶれい.' 'あらい' implies roughness or crudeness, often indicating a lack of care or detail. 'ぶれい,' on the other hand, means rude or disrespectful, which stands in direct contrast to the politeness suggested by 'ていねい.'

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は丁寧(ていねい)に話(はな)す。

translations.VI: Anh ấy nói chuyện lịch sự.
translations.TL: Siya ay nagsasalita ng may paggalang.
translations.MY: သူဟာယဉ်ပါးစွာပြောပါတယ်။
translations.HI: वह शिष्टाचार से बात करता है।

example_sentences.kanji: 手紙を丁寧に書きます。
example_sentences.furigana: 手紙(てがみ)を丁寧(ていねい)に書(か)きます。

translations.EN: I will write the letter neatly.
translations.ID: Saya akan menulis surat dengan rapi.
translations.VI: Tôi sẽ viết lá thư một cách cẩn thận.
translations.FR: Je vais écrire la lettre soigneusement.
translations.TL: Isusulat ko ang liham nang maayos.
translations.HI: मैं पत्र को सावधानी से लिखूँगा।
translations.FA: نامه را با دقت و ظرافت خواهم نوشت.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼女は丁寧な対応をします。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼女(かのじょ)は丁寧(ていねい)な対応(たいおう)をします。

translations.VI: Cô ấy trả lời một cách lịch sự.
translations.MY: သူမသည်ယဉ်ကျေးစွာဖြေကြားသည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は丁寧なあいさつをしました。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は丁寧(ていねい)なあいさつをしました。

translations.VI: Anh ấy đã chào hỏi lịch sự.
translations.FR: Il a fait une salutation polie.
translations.ZH: 他打了一个礼貌的招呼。
translations.TL: Nagbigay siya ng magalang na pagbati.
translations.MY: သူကယဥ်ကျေး‌သောနှုတ်ခွန်းဆက်ခြင်းပေးခဲ့သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は丁寧な説明をしました。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は丁寧(ていねい)な説明(せつめい)をしました。

translations.VI: Anh ấy đã giải thích một cách lịch sự.
translations.FR: Il a donné une explication polie.
translations.ZH: 他做了一个礼貌的解释。
translations.TL: Nagbigay siya ng magalang na paliwanag.
translations.MY: သူကယဉ်ကျေးစွာရှင်းပြခဲ့သည်။

meanings: counter for guns, tools, leaves or cakes of something
